scripts.vm:provision: multipass launch --name umbrel-dev --cpus 4 --memory 8G --disk 50G 23.10 && npm run vm:transfer && multipass exec umbrel-dev -- /opt/umbrel/scripts/provision-vm
scripts.vm:transfer: npm run vm:exec -- -- sudo mkdir -p /opt/umbrel/scripts; npm run vm:exec -- -- sudo mkdir -p /opt/umbrel/packages/umbreld; npm run vm:exec -- -- sudo mkdir -p /opt/umbrel/packages/ui; npm run vm:exec -- -- sudo chown -R ubuntu:ubuntu /opt/umbrel && multipass transfer --recursive $PWD/scripts/. umbrel-dev:/opt/umbrel/scripts && multipass transfer --recursive $PWD/packages/ui/. umbrel-dev:/opt/umbrel/packages/ui && multipass transfer --recursive $PWD/packages/umbreld/. umbrel-dev:/opt/umbrel/packages/umbreld
scripts.vm:umbreld: multipass exec umbrel-dev -- bash -c 'cd /opt/umbrel/packages/umbreld && sudo npm run dev -- --port 80'
scripts.vm:ui: multipass exec umbrel-dev -- bash -c 'cd /opt/umbrel/packages/ui && sudo pnpm run dev'
